#summary Describe the schema and example queries of the RDF TCMGeneDIT dataset (http://tcm.lifescience.ntu.edu.tw/).
See also: http://code.google.com/p/junsbriefcase/wiki/TGDdataset

= Data Ontology for the RDF TCM Dataset =
|| Classes ||       ||
||         || Disease ||
||         || Medicine||
||         || Gene    ||
||         || Ingredient||
||         || Effect||

||  Object Properties || Domain || Range ||
|| treatment || Medicine || Disease ||
|| association || Medicine || Gene ||
|| medicine || Disease || Medicine ||
|| gene || Disease || Gene ||
|| ingredient || Medicine || Ingredient ||
|| effect || Medicine || Effect ||

= Example SPARQL Queries =
== Find all the tcm medicines that can treat Alzheimer's disease ==
{{{
 PREFIX tcm:      <http://tcm.lifescience.ntu.edu.tw/>
 PREFIX rdf:      <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
 select distinct ?medicine
 where {?medicine tcm:treatment <http://tcm.lifescience.ntu.edu.tw/id/disease/Alzheimer_Disease>}
}}}

== Find all the effect information about the tcm medicines that can treat Alzheimer's disease ==
{{{
 PREFIX tcm:      <http://tcm.lifescience.ntu.edu.tw/>
 PREFIX rdf:      <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
 select distinct ?medicine ?effect
 where {?medicine 
    tcm:treatment <http://tcm.lifescience.ntu.edu.tw/id/disease/Alzheimer_Disease> ; 
    tcm:effect ?effect
 }
}}}
== Find all the gene-herb-disease associations for a particular gene ==
{{{
 PREFIX tcm:      <http://tcm.lifescience.ntu.edu.tw/>
 PREFIX rdf:      <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
 PREFIX rdfs:     <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
 select distinct *
 where {?gene rdfs:label ?name .
        filter regex(?name, "^CASP") .
        ?disease tcm:medicine ?herb ;
                 tcm:gene ?gene.
 }
}}}
